name: Bitume
overview:
2091… After the greatest economic collapse in history, the United States government can not guarantee security throughout the country. Gangs and motorized organizations enforce rules on the roads, and convoys rarely reach their destination. You have been hired to rescue and escort a convoy in distress.

Bitume is an arcade game inspired by "Asphalt" (UBI Soft 1987). You have to go through five roads to rescue the convoy. The gangs on the road will try to destroy you.
